post.title: China is Gaining Soft Power with AI
post.excerpt: China is gaining soft power using AI with models from Alibaba for instance. Qwen and DeepSeek are slowly shifting the narrative of AI outputs to being pro-Chinese: https://x.com/ForeignAffairs/status/1949941435404370349
